room_title: Escape room "CSI Myrtle Beach" by Break Out Myrtle Beach in Myrtle Beach
review: My family and some friends did the CSI Myrtle Beach room and we had a great time trying to escape. We made it out with 7 minutes to spare. The staff was very friendly and helpful when we needed it.

room_title: Escape room "CSI Myrtle Beach" by Break Out Myrtle Beach in Myrtle Beach
review: My family and I had the best time! We were able to rent out the whole room due to the fact we were traveling with a 15 month old. We took part in the CSI senario which exciting and invigorating! (not at all scary for younger kids). The staff was friendly, funny, personal, and very helpful when we (unfortunately) struggled and needed some clues. All 5 adults who played were new to escape rooms and we will certainly continue to play! The next time we visit Myrtle Beach, we will hit up Breakout again!!!

room_title: Escape room "CSI Myrtle Beach" by Break Out Myrtle Beach in Myrtle Beach
review: Fourteen of us showed up for a surprise birthday party for our friend We all had a really great time! Very challenging but not impossible!! Good brain exercise! We can't wait to come back!! Staff was super nice and helpful! Thanks for everything!!!
